website_summaries.verdict: Holds up to 30 pounds of food or other emergency items needed in the wilderness.
pros: Built by the minds of those seeking military-grade design, resulting in a triple-padlocked product
Made of plastic, lending to longtime durability
Features a water-resistant O-ring seal for dry storage
Great for going away for extended periods of time
cons: Does not come with a water filtration system

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for my purposes. I am using it as an enclosure for a pfSense router. It latches really well and was easy to work with, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: ThePapa

customer_reviews.title: I have been happy with all of them.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of the larger MTM Ammo crates as well as a couple of smaller cans and I have been happy with all of them. I purchase this one to use as a hard case for a first aid kit. I like the bright orange color and the size works well for a kit. I prefer the smaller ones for ammo transport and the larger crates for storage. This size ammo can, will easily exceed 30 pounds when full of ammo. So this size is not my favorite for ammo. While I like this ammo can for mixed storage, I would recommend you use the smaller cans or the double handle crates for your ammo transport and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for All Kinds of Things
customer_reviews.text: I have an bunch of these, none hold ammo... They're great for organized, water resistant R/V storage. I've got kits for electrical, plumbing, stabilzer jacks, etc... A great timesaver and the stuff is protected. No more climbing deep into a compartment to get an electric adaptor, hockey puck, or jack screw... I also use them for radio control modelling field equipment, power tools, and keeping accessories together for my power equipment like pressure washers. I wish they were available in more colors!
customer_reviews.author: B a r r y

customer_reviews.title: a good spotlight was ruined
customer_reviews.text: This box is not water-resistant. I bought one to keep tools in on my boat and it was stored in a compartment that also has a rubber seal around the lid, but some moisture would get in if it rained hard. I thought this box would keep things dry. I went to get something out of the box and everything in it was wet, a good spotlight was ruined, and tools were rusty. Right next to this ammo box in that compartment I had a roll of toilet paper in a plastic Folgers coffee can. The toilet paper was dry as a bone. So if you are planning on buying this to keep things dry, save your money.
customer_reviews.author: ufo52

customer_reviews.title: Great cans but watch out for the weight
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice, they obviously hold a lot more than the MilSpec 50cal cans, but therein lies the issue; they're extremely heavy when fully packed with ammunition. If you're not going to carry it far, or you're not going to completely fill these cans up, you'll be fine, but if you're planning on packing them up completely like the picture shows, be prepared to have an ammo can that's not easily portable over any significant distance. Personally, I'm going to go with the .50cal sized MTMs for my ammo storage, they seem to be a better compromise between size, ammo weight, and portability. I'll still find a use for these big cans, they're well made.
customer_reviews.author: Old Dominion

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, lightweight and strong.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent box. I will be building a battery backup box with this. Has plenty of room on the cover for gauges, buttons and accessories. Deep enough for a battery and the electrical wires and components plus extra storage. Top and sides should hold up well even with the drilled holes. You can see this box in action on YouTube. Great box for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. lubchansky

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made, good design & waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent MTM molded design and overall quality. Every boat needs an absolutely dry storage box for its papers. The lid fastens securely and makes a waterproof seal. There's a handy storage tray in the top of the box for small items. I suppose if you wanted to keep your lunch in it, it would work for that too.
customer_reviews.author: KY Mel

customer_reviews.title: A STRONGBOX FOR YOUR BULLETS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This ammo box is very strong, very secure with waterproofing seals and strong latches and it's far bigger than I had anticipated!! It is a very nice box indeed! The handle is also strong and will support a completely filled and heavily loaded box. I also like the double latches for their extra security and strength. It is lockable and can be stacked with other boxes. Overall, I will recommend it to others, and feel it is a very good and economically-priced ammo can. MTM is a reputable name with another GREAT product added to its name!!
customer_reviews.author: ERIC T.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than the green version
customer_reviews.text: When I went back to buy more of the Green versions of this ammo can, I noticed that the orange was a few bucks cheaper with identical dimensions! This product is well made and holds about a case (1,000 rounds, in boxes) or more (depending on caliber) in each box. Toss a couple silica pouches in and you're good to go. If you want to get fancy, I suppose to you could buy those plastic liners. Seems durable. Stacks rather nicely. Pleased that they've helped me organize thousands of rounds of ammo in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Formidable Aardvark

customer_reviews.title: 5th one of these I own. The 50 cal ...
customer_reviews.text: 5th one of these I own. The 50 cal can is okay, but this holds MUCH more. First one bought after buying the MTM 45 cal ammo combo which only held 700 rounds. I was taking a class that needed 1,000 and the 9mm ammo combo held that much. I didn't want to carry 2 cans so I ordered this can and 3 more boxes and carried my 1,000 rounds in it.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: 46 POUNDS (1660 ROUNDS) OF .223 AMMO.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these cans to be used for storing ammunition as well as emergency kits. I loaded up a single box with 1,660 rounds of 55 grain .223 ammunition. There were 83- 20 round boxes of ammunition I put into the storage can. The weight of the fill can was 46 pounds. There was no flex in the handle or can. I believe these will last for as long as I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Anna_SD

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find item in local specialty stores, their loss. Product was accurately described & presented. Will be a returning customer. Very pleased with the purchase. Delivered ahead of schedule.
customer_reviews.author: steven jonas

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, well made.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could find more of these. This was an awesome buy at about $20 for such a well made product. I've used old 50 cal ammo cans in the past, but unless I'm carrying 50-75lbs or more, I'll use this MTM Ammo Can, model AC35. It has lock holes, and a decently made clasp. Hinge seems heavy duty. I have several boxes of ammo, cleaning supplies, shooting glasses, about 35-40lbs in this can and I don't worry about whether it can handle the weight. Good handle, not sure about other reviewers commenting about the handle quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hale

customer_reviews.title: Good Size, but Still Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Huge. It's huger than I thought. The hugerest. A couple of boxes of shotgun shells, 9mm rounds, room for the cleaning kits. I was impressed. I bought it for the lock ability at the latch end, because we have young children around, but I think that the sides actually may allow room to finagle tiny fingers in there, hopefully not pull out anything. If they find steel sheers though the box may be doomed. Good things the guns are in a different safe.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Emergency Power Box
customer_reviews.text: Plenty big for what I use it for. I have a 35ah SLA battery in there along with some wiring. I can also store my Juentai JT-6188 mobile radio in there as well. Caulked everything to keep the waterproofing although I would still be careful not to drop it in water. I have confidence in the rain, though.
customer_reviews.author: DIY Junky

customer_reviews.title: Handy and Capacious
customer_reviews.text: Hauls all my equipment/ammo to the range. Padlocks for the trip (CA laws). Orange so I don't forget to bring it home. Haven't needed to check water tightness yet. Please send rain!!! Finally, a chance to use "capacious" in a review! It holds a lot of equipment, gadgets, etc. (aka junk).
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: works great, Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: nice and roomy, this is bigger than a standard GI 50cal ammo can, in fact one will fit inside of it and the lid will close. it is well made and made in the USA, what more can I say. I am using it for storing emergency supplies for my wifes car, cant miss the bright orange. Over all I would Highly recommend this ammo can.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Grey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic ammo can. Bigger than you think.
customer_reviews.text: Easily holds ten 25-round 2 3/4 12 ga shell boxes with room to spare. It's big! Rugged construction, thick plastic. Made in the USA! Comfortable handle, stackable. Three 1/4" lock holes, 2 locking tabs. 3/16"-diameter-shackle locks fit perfectly. 1/4" locks too tight in my opinion (you could reem out the holes if needed.) Should last forever indoors. Purchased another (Forest Green version) to hold supplies. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Fits all my ammo and ammo cases and it’s tall enough to stand up ar-15 30 rd mags. Next to it is an ammo can I got at cabelas. It’s a little wider and shorter but it’s made of thick plastic that seems like it’s going to hold up just fine
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend - great selection
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 3 styles and they all serve my purposes very well. I use these boxes for conducting firearm training classes. They are durable, well designed, lockable, easy to stack and go, and reasonably priced. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholm

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing ammo
customer_reviews.text: The box works great for storing ammo. I haven't had it long enough to be able to judge durability. I like the blaze orange color.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Davis

customer_reviews.title: MTM Ammo Cans.
customer_reviews.text: I own two of these MTM Ammo Cans. High quality, well built & very sturdy. I also have the traditional metal army ammo cans & preferring one over the other would be hard to do. The bonus on the MTM Ammo Cans is that they are designed to stack & have pre-drilled holes if you want to put a lock on the latch. I really like these ammo cans. I'm glad I got them. Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Blind woodcrafter

customer_reviews.title: Great Storage Solution
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Nerf bullet storage. Added vinyl stickers. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Super storage container !!!
customer_reviews.text: I now have purchased my ninth "MTM" storage box and have liked them all !!! The boxes have an "O-ring" seal to keep out moisture and the boxes are sturdy enough for all my uses. I found the handle and latch are good quality, too. I also like to put packets of silica gel desiccant in the boxes for longer term storage " just in case"..... This is a product that I can recommend to anyone !!!!
customer_reviews.author: RIK  L.

customer_reviews.title: Great value but sticker leaves an annoying residue.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price but has a few flaws: the holes for attaching a lock are rather narrow, the side-walls are on the thin side and do not have a rough texture (the top does, but why not do the sides as well?), and sticker adhesive on the side leaves an annoying, sticky residue that requires some Goo-Gone or similar product to remove. Compare to Plano products that leave no residue.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Clary

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Good price, color I wanted, sturdy, clamps are secure. has enough room for all my 9mm ammunition boxes, I'd say about 800-900 rounds maybe less since I sometime throw my ear protection in there. One nitpick, and this is somewhat trivial, but I had wished it came with at least 1 small lock as a courtesy. Overall I definitely would recommend and mostly will be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: bboyer8690

customer_reviews.title: Will absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I carried 1500 rounds of 9mm as well as all my range gear in this. I'm amazed at this item. 1500 rounds of 9mm 2 pairs of fun muffs 2 pairs of eye protection Field cleaning kit Speed loader All this stuff fits perfectly in this ammo box and feels secure and sturdy when being carried. Great item. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great box. But the bottom of it had a deep ripple in it.
customer_reviews.author: Harmon Ford

customer_reviews.title: Big and bright!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these dry cans.. They are bigger than I had anticipated, but that is a good thing. I actually store my ammo in green cans and store medical items in the orange ones.
customer_reviews.author: Russell & Amber Bohlmann

customer_reviews.title: It will still work just fine for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Ammo can to use as a box to hold my household first aid kit. It's larger than I expected it to be. I was expecting it to be 50cal sized. I'm sure if I read the description it says it in there. It will still work just fine for my needs. It's very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Andy!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't trip on these as often as I do the green ones for some reason
customer_reviews.author: Mr Kanook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for boxed ammo
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. I liked the first one so much I bought another. Both of mine are filled past the top with ammo. The latch closes securely and the system accepts exterior locks. There is a rubber gasket around the lid that helps ensure no elements can get in. For a little added protection, I've thrown in a couple of 10g silica packets in each of my containers in case the gasket fails. Don't know how they would perform outdoors - as mine sit permanently in a locked bedroom closet. You simply cannot beat the price for something made this well. Almost ranks right up there with weatherproof Pelican cases - although not as thick and beefy as a Pelican.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: This Marine box works quite well in holding a "car ...
customer_reviews.text: This Marine box works quite well in holding a "car battery" by our bed, which I adapted it for 12 Volt sockets, as to hook up our CPAP machines in an emergency!
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: Grat dry storage, not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: A great container and fit exactly into the measurements I needed it to. Although not waterproof, lid fits tight. You could feel the tightness when closing and feel air excaping. Love this box and I am going to order many more. (orange)
customer_reviews.author: MEE

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect it to be so big and voluminous. That's a plus in my book. Although it is made of plastic, it seems sturdy enough to store my odds and ends without falling apart. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: WargRider

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product
customer_reviews.text: Love these ammo boxes! Will hold 800 45 caliber shells easily.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T. Addison

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cans hehe
customer_reviews.text: Nice, and bright, and it's sexy. I put these on the floor so military ammo cans would hurt my toes if I accidently kicked it, this plastic ones don't. I'm not a zombie SHTF guy, so i cycle through my ammo at a decent rate where storage is only to keep it out of the kids hands, not for shelf life.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jr

customer_reviews.title: MTM IS THE BEST!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this one so much, that I bought 3 more!!!!!! I like the both the Green color and the Orange color. You cannot go wrong with MTM. These were better than the Plano and the Flambeau similar items. I shopped around first and chose these...GLAD I DID. Just get them fast before the price increases..LOL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice box
customer_reviews.text: Great price, good box. Sturdy and have had no problems with the box. Store 12 ga 00 buck shot and rifle ammo in this box.The only negative is it takes 2 locks to secure the ammo box. Would rather of needed to use one. I would of given it 5 stars if I could have used just one lock. Perhaps they are in the lock business too. LOL just kidding. Regards Richard Faller
customer_reviews.author: Richard M Faller

customer_reviews.title: fits everything you want!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this box, it is big enough to fit 350 rounds of shotshells or a wide range of bullets still in the box. Definitely a must to organize your things especially ammo. Very tough and can handle alot of weight and has a great seal around the lid if you want to store something and keep it dry. Need to order more to finish organizing all my STUFF!! This can is also the same size as the green design and can be stacked together..
customer_reviews.author: E.K.

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: I dont care that it is orange, these are great cans for storing your ammo. Stacked properly with a can organizer, you can fit more than eight thousand rounds of .22 LR in one can. Will be buying again when the need arises. The double lock tabs are a plus, so you can have two seperate padlocks if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Schrage

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: It's a good heavy duty ammo box. Beware, if you fill this thing with boxes of .45ACP, you're going to have a VERY heavy box to lug around - just food for thought.
customer_reviews.author: KenPetri

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Ammo Can
customer_reviews.text: Ammo can does the trick. Latches are sturdy as I can pack a lot of handgun ammo in it to take to the range. I have several Olive Drab ones, so this one intentionally stands out for me as "The Ammo Box"
customer_reviews.author: rrpete

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid constructions, extremely inexpensive and I love being able to get it in bright orange.
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid constructions, extremely inexpensive and I love being able to get it in bright orange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not gold
customer_reviews.text: Nice box good for various storage, got 4 for a gift wanted four of mine own but....a limit? Why sell the things if you are going to limit them? There are other comparable boxes (black) for same or cheaper, recommend them, as many as you need and subdued
customer_reviews.author: Clay Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Huge ammo box
customer_reviews.text: So I didn't read how big this thing was! It's about 2-3 times as big as I thought it would be! It's huge lol! I love the bright orange! My husband is gonna have it full in no time...5 seconds after opening it for Xmas lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It holds ammo, the lid closes, it is ...
customer_reviews.text: It holds ammo, the lid closes, it is orange. Really what else is there to say. Oh, I guess the handle has not broken.
customer_reviews.author: smankins

customer_reviews.title: Nice Box
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ammo box. Solid and well built. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Logan

customer_reviews.title: The perfect dry box / ammo solution!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about these dry storage boxes by MTM. They are built like a tank, have locking latches, and best of all and O-ring to keep moisture out. I want two more!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Great box the handle can do some work though.
customer_reviews.text: I like this ammo can a lot but the handle sometimes slips off and the box has fallen many times completely full yet it has not cracked or broke once fully loaded about 50 pounds so this plastic is tough as nails. I just wish the handle was designed a little bit better.
customer_reviews.author: James mang

customer_reviews.title: nice size
customer_reviews.text: I wish that it had been designed to need only one lock to keep the contents secured. If you use only one, children could get their little hands in there. The lock placement should have been designed to go on the latch in the center. If you don't use two locks, you might as well not use any.
customer_reviews.author: Russ R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are priced very cheap. I have about 12 of them for a bunch of different calibers.
customer_reviews.author: jono1798

customer_reviews.title: These are the best cans I've found
customer_reviews.text: These are the best cans I've found. Love them. Hate the price. ...but if you watch, they come down to a reasonable level sometimes. I like the orange ones because whatever I write on them shows up better.
customer_reviews.author: thisguy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with MTM-always high quality, always do what they're intended to do.
customer_reviews.author: ThomasL

customer_reviews.title: I found this to be a really good quality and sturdy box
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be a really good quality and sturdy box. I was able to put 800-1000 rounds of 9mm boxed ammo in for storage. It is bigger than most standard ammo cases. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Stabbe

customer_reviews.title: This is the best deal I could find
customer_reviews.text: Tough can. I was able to put a lot of ammo (about 10 boxes of 16 gauge, unboxed and several boxes of .38 Special, 9mm, and 22 long rifle boxed). Really seems durable even though it's incredibly heavy when full. This is the best deal I could find.
customer_reviews.author: SirArturious

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these ammo cans. Two latches for added security and they are stackable
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great tool box for Kubota
customer_reviews.text: Mounted to the back of my Kubota. Orange color is pretty close but not exact. Still better than the usual olive color. Box is pretty sturdy but I haven't had it through a winter yet.
customer_reviews.author: ACC Inc

customer_reviews.title: Ok deal
customer_reviews.text: Good as any others I've bought and priced well. Didn't have to wait for a gunshow to come to town
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ORANGE AMMO CAN IS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I use this can for all my 22 cal. rounds. Both boxed and loose ammo. This is the ammo can I take with me to go shooting and I can all my extra ammo at home. I have the green 12 Gauge ammo can for the same reason. Needless to say the black ammo can is for my 9 MM ammo.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: This is a great ammo can
customer_reviews.text: This ammo can is great for my .22lr and 9mm ammunition. It has lock holes for security, and the plastic is heavy duty. It can definitely pull its weight. As my armory builds up, I will definitely rack and stack these in my home.
customer_reviews.author: RVA-Steve

customer_reviews.title: Nice box. Built tough.
customer_reviews.text: Strong plastic. I'm using it to hold 2 batteries and controller for my ebike. Sits on back rack perfectly. Also accepts Krylon Fusion black paint well.
customer_reviews.author: Zipparado

customer_reviews.title: Great Container
customer_reviews.text: Quality piece. Great seal around the lid and snaps closed tightly. Can fit in about 1400 rounds of boxed 9mm. Much more if you dump them straight into the container.
customer_reviews.author: Techvania

customer_reviews.title: My favorite for reloading supply and ammo storage by caliber.
customer_reviews.text: MTM has changed the design of the AC-11 Ammo Can, but this one is the older single latch design, which I prefer. Highly recommended. Get them while you can. I believe the other colors are gone and now backordered for the new style.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Its an ammo can...... ...
customer_reviews.text: Its an ammo can...... locks, seals, and you cant miss it. I can fit 6 individual MTM caseguard 50 count boxes in it. Well built, will buy more if I need another can or two.
customer_reviews.author: dillon randolph rowley

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAN!!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT CAN!!! First bought these for Ammo, but now use them for "stowage" of other things; especially in the SUV. Light weight, well built!
customer_reviews.author: Wm. "B.j." Pollock, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Ammo can
customer_reviews.text: Great Ammo can. I bought the orange one because it was cheaper that the green one. Same thing, just a different color. What's up with that?
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Good design larger then expected
customer_reviews.text: It is larger then i expected but has plenty of room for what i need it for .. great buy
customer_reviews.author: jaeshaun

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one in green and this in Orange color for quick indentification of the first to grab storage box in emergency situation. Solid construction, double closure. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Karl K. White

customer_reviews.title: Keep them shells Organized
customer_reviews.text: Very good product! I have bought back in 2012 with the single latch model. No cracks or aging of plastic at this time. worth the cost and more.
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great. Bigger than 50 cal ammo can. I store emergency stuff in my car trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Kip

customer_reviews.title: If this box can hold up against a four year old then it's amazing! So I'm sure your ammo will be safety ...
customer_reviews.text: Haha this is probably irrelevant to ammo, but I used this can as a storage box for my son's toy tools (he has quite a few), and it kept them protected and dry! If this box can hold up against a four year old then it's amazing! So I'm sure your ammo will be safety dry. (;
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: MTM cases. Made to last and last
customer_reviews.text: I have used nothing but MTM gear storage and ammo storage cases. For the money they can't be beat and I have some that are around 10 years old and never a burp. They work like the day I bought them
customer_reviews.author: (S)Samantha Moceri

customer_reviews.title: Big can
customer_reviews.text: Great company, great product. I was surprised by the size, this can is bigger than the standard MTM cans I had ordered before. It works great for holding AR mags. I will definitely buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Use one as my ammo can to and from the range and it has held up great after a couple months use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a couple of these and they are able to hold some weight. Use one as my ammo can to and from the range and it has held up great after a couple months use.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Solid can
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a case for my do it yourself boom box. The case is well built, seals well - due to the sealing rubberized ring. The clasps are solid, and the box is overall well balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: More storage, cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Great product, surprisingly large - bigger than the 50cal ammo boxes...and cheaper!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good size for 100 count cartridge boxes & great price, I'll be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: Huge ammo can....
customer_reviews.text: ....but with the increased size over a traditional 50 cal ammo can, I am not sure how much the latch will hold up when this thing is full of ammo. The latch does not seem very study, but it has not failed me yet.
customer_reviews.author: RMillie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my emergency kit in case something goes wrong. Nice, high quality like all of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little larger than standard ammo cans making it just right to carry bricks of 22s.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Works fine.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and rubber gasket for the water proof seal.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I didn't use this for the intended
customer_reviews.text: I used it to mount on the back of my electric bike to use as a battery box. It's had torrential rains it's found itself in several times, now, and the battery and electronics have stayed bone dry. So, I can attest to it being weather proof.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Berlin

customer_reviews.title: Great ammo can
customer_reviews.text: Great ammo can. Very sturdy and feels solid even when fully loaded with heavy ammo. Color is great and easy to spot in a dark closet.
customer_reviews.author: Matty B

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for a long day at the range!
customer_reviews.text: These things are huge. I was expecting a normal size ammo can. I put all my ammo along with hearing and eye protection, staple gun, speed loaders, extra mags, and anything else I need in it when I go to the range. It is also well built, I have one with around 1500 rounds of .223 ammo in it and it can fit a good bit more before it would beak.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Venable II

customer_reviews.title: Pretty heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Pretty heavy duty. I'm not using it for ammo. It houses two 12v batteries, a charger and an LED flood Light attached to the top. I call it "Super Flood"
customer_reviews.author: Sherlock Ohms

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.....
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality box. If I want it a different color I'm buying a 99 cent can of spray paint at Walmart and I'm good to go!
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: These are AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: A lil bigger than I expected but its perfect, great for hauling all my camping gear.
customer_reviews.author: A.D.

customer_reviews.title: strong, ridged
customer_reviews.text: fully loaded. no flex. I've 2 of them. While the lock area could be bigger to accommodate common locks still a 5. I n each box I've 15# ammo.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great. Huge! Stores all my maps with plenty of extra room for phone, car keys, etc while camping.

customer_reviews.text: I have ordered them before and I liked them so much I ordered some more this year. Use them for storing a lot of gun parts .

customer_reviews.title: Unlike other ammo cans, this one is built with ...
customer_reviews.text: Unlike other ammo cans, this one is built with thicker plastic. Also, the new double latch mechanism is an improvement on the single latch.

customer_reviews.text: Right size, stacks well, tough, and lockable. Just what I needed!

product_meta.title: MTM Ammo Can
product_meta.description: This O-Ring sealed ammo can offers the perfect solution to so many dry storage box needs. Made to carry boxed or bulk ammo, it can be used for organizing and storing shooting, hunting or survival gear. MTM Ammo Can easily handles 30 pounds of gear. Molded out of rugged high-impact polypropylene plastic, this comfortably handled box holds up to some pretty rough treatment. Heavy-duty dual latching system makes for a better seal and less likely to open accidentally. Triple padlock tabbed for security. Molded-in stacking ridges for slip resistant stacking. Great for damp basements or storage sheds. Can be used as a boaters – marine dry storage box, first aid kits, safety, emergency and RV camper storage container. Made in the USA.
feature_bullets: Military-style can offers dry storage for ammunition, emergency gear, medical supplies, batteries, food, tools, boating and valuables.
Water-resistant O-ring seal for dry storage: Non-submersible
Strong Comfortable handle, designed to be stacked and triple padlock tabbed for security
Heavy-duty dual latching system makes for a better seal and less likely to open accidentally
Outside dimensions: 15.3" x 9.2" x 9" High - Inside dimensions: 12.5" x 7.5" x 7.2" High - Made in USA
